abstract: Hewlett-Packard had hoped that Mark Hurd’s resignation would close this chapter, but a stream of leaks followed.
snippet: Hewlett-Packard had hoped that Mark Hurd’s resignation would close this chapter, but a stream of leaks followed.
lead_paragraph: Even after a former actress in erotic films had accused Hewlett-Packard‘s chief executive, Mark V. Hurd, of sexual harassment, the company’s board stood behind him, Ashlee Vance writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: Despite H.P.’s Efforts, Spectacle Goes On
